title: StatePattern
description: Reusable state machine template for common UX interaction flows, composed of named ExperienceStates and transitions. Canonical examples: 'wizard' — multi-step form with back/next/submit transitions; 'optimistic-update' — loading → success/error with retry; 'tab-panel' — N peer states with tab-driven transitions; 'authenticated-route' — unauthenticated → redirect/login → authenticated.

category.description: Functional taxonomy of the reusable state machine pattern.

states.description: Ordered list of ExperienceState specNodeIds comprising this reusable pattern. The first entry is the initial state.

items.description: specNodeId of an ExperienceState node belonging to this pattern.
